attributes.action: shops to limit how much one person can buy toilet roll to only 2 packs per buyer
attributes.additional_details: So many shops have ran out of goods like toilet roll, pasta, bread,milk, hand sanitizer, hand soap and it’s leaving families without
attributes.background: To put a limit on how much one person can buy toilet roll as families are struggling and people just keep hoarding!! If we make it 2 packs per customer that’s more then enough for everyone!
